Uses of Package
org.jdesktop.animation.timing

Classes in org.jdesktop.animation.timing used by org.jdesktop.animation.timing
Cycle
          This class defines the duration and resolution of a single timing cycle.
Envelope
          This object holds values that describe the overall TimingController sequence.
Envelope.EndBehavior
          EndBehavior determines what happens at the end of the Envelope.
Envelope.RepeatBehavior
          RepeatBehavior determines how each successive cycle will flow.
KeyFrames
          KeyFrames holds information about the times at which values are sampled (KeyTimes) and the values at those times (KeyValues).
KeyFrames.InterpolationType
          Type of interpolation used between each value in KeyValues.
KeySplines
          KeySplines is used to hold the information about the splines used in a KeyFrames object.
KeyTimes
          Stores a list of times from 0 to 1 that are used in calculating interpolated values for ObjectModifier given a matching set of KeyValues and possibly KeySplines for those times.
KeyValues
          Stores a list of values that correspond to the times in a KeyTimes object.
PropertyRange
          This class is used to hold a property name and a range of values that represent the values that the property can attain over time.
Spline
          This class holds the control points for a spline.
TimingTarget
          This interface provides three methods which are called by TimingController during the course of a timing sequence.
